full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Miscellaneous Equipment Repair and Overhaul Service Provider

#### Notice Details
* **Reference Number:** CB-984-20742339
* **Amendment Number:** 13
* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-23SJ02/A
* **Publication Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 7, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Tender Status:** CLOSED

#### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD (Supplies or Service - Works, Non-Construction, Total Value Less than $2 million)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Cost-per-Point
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is open to tender from suppliers who are registered on the Canadian Government's Trade Agreements list.
* **Region of Opportunity:** World
* **Region of Delivery:** Canada

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence, Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management, has a requirement for the delivery of efficient and effective repair, overhaul, testing, reduction to spares, technical investigation and engineering support services for various third line repairable aviation and/or aviation support equipment in support of Royal Canadian Air Force’s (RCAF) worldwide operations.

This procurement includes security requirements. For additional information, please refer to Annex C: Security Requirement Check List and consult Part 6: Security and Other Requirements, and Part 7: Resulting Contract Clauses. For more information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses, please refer to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (http://ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html) website.

Estimated time frame of contract: Four years plus two (2) irrevocable option years.

#### Documents and Attachments
* Tender Notice
* Amendment 008
* Notice of Proposed Procurement
* Security Requirement Check List
* Resulting Contract Clauses
* Performance Work Statement (Annex A)

#### Contact Information
Contact Person: Sharon Sally
Email: sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (819) 939-8990

You can reach out to Sharon Sally for any questions or clarification regarding this tender notice.
